title: 'Completely suppresses any odor'

title: 'Long lasting'
body: 'Smells good and lasts long! Perfect for overlapping body odour'

title: 'Really awesome product!!'
body: The item has a very refreshing lemony mint fresh and mild scent, and regarding its longevity i generally use it after bath and it stays all day if I am at home but don't prefer it when am going outside cuz with sweating the smell fades away in some time

title: 'Refreshing'
body: 'Very good product ease to use thnku Amazon'

title: 'Better than deo'
body: 'The smell is good and no wastage unlike deo. Also the smell is long lasting. You may not smell it from far away but keeps your body odour free for whole day.'

title: 'Just ok'
body: 'Just ok kind of product. Normal deos are more long lasting. Park Avenue sports is better for aqua lovers. This smell is good
column5: but last only an hour or so.'

title: 'Excellent'
body: 'Long lasting and does not irritate skin'

body: 'If you like mild and fresh fragrance
column5: then you must go for it. "Him product"'

body: 'Product is good but courier chgs is to high'

title: 'Not good.'
body: The scent doesn't last even for one hour.

title: 'Anti sweat'
body: 'Very light smell but not very lasting smell.'

title: 'Okayish product but darkens skin'
body: The product does what it says, didn't get any odour as it lasts an entire day, however as a person suffering from hyperpigmentation due to Acanthosis, this product darkens the hyperpigmented areas so would not recommend for people with hyperpigmentation.

title: 'Stay for long and value for money.'
body: Generally Deo don't stay for longer but this stick really stay for like more than a day or two, It has a very slow and good smell, it feels fresh and pleasent to the nose and now I'm using it as my daily deo, it's good...

title: 'ok ok !!!'
body: 'It is written that it lasts for 48 hours which is wrong...it lasts for 5-6 hrs... Fragrance is also ok ok ....Expected much better from a brand like NIVIA..'
